jaemsjohn wrote:
> Hello -
>
> I don't know if this program is overkill or just right, so, I figured 
> I would ask the group. I need
> to create an application that will check links and the anchor text 
> against a database.

Its straight-forward enough plugging in a little module that per page, 
asks Heritrix for the list of links found to try against an external 
database.  But Heritrix does not currently extract anchor text nor does 
it maintain the order in which links were found in a page.  You'd have 
to write your own extractor to do this. 

You might take a look at nutch. I know its HTMLparser pulls the anchor 
text.  I don't know if it respects order.

St.Ack
